1295030.name: Zagan Must Be Rescued
1295030.description:
Zagan Must Be Rescued is a FPS survival game where you will feel the fear and excitement in your marrow .
you will have your weapon and teleport ability to fight against enemies that are turning around.

Features:

- Fight alone against enemies that increase in every wave from the start of the game.

- Ammo is unlimited but use the features of your weapons according to your game style.

- Set your own play style on each different map.

-Break your record with the points you earn in every enemy you kill.

-Determine your game tactics according to the increasing number of enemies in each wave
